rules: Headings (h1, h2): Tracking tight (-0.02em), Weight 600 or 800. NO default bold.
Labels/Overlines: Uppercase, Tracking wide (0.1em), Text-xs, Weight 500.
Numbers/Data: Use tabular-nums for all metrics and dates.
NO Drop Shadows on cards (use 1px borders instead).
Primary Action Buttons: Solid Black (#18181B) with White Text.
Secondary Buttons: White with Border (#E4E4E7) and Black Text.
Destructive Actions: White with Red Text and Red Border (No solid red buttons).
Mobile: Stacked view. List takes 100%, Detail opens as full-screen drawer.
Padding: Use p-6 or p-8 for main content areas to allow breathing room.
Borders: Use 'divide-y' and 'divide-x' utilities for grid separation instead of gaps.

buttons.style: Sharp corners (rounded-md) or Full Pill (rounded-full). Consistency is key.

inputs.style: bg-transparent, border-b (border-zinc-200), focus:border-black. Minimalist 'Line' style for search.
inputs.standard: Shadcn Input with rounded-md and border-zinc-200.

email_list_item.style: Row layout. Left: Avatar/Icon. Middle: Sender/Subject. Right: Date/Badge.
email_list_item.interaction: Hover: bg-zinc-50. Selected: bg-zinc-100 + border-l-2 border-black.

ai_badge.style: Pill shape, text-xs, font-medium. Ring-1 ring-inset.

usage_rules: Use 'empty_state' for when no emails are found or folders are empty.
Use 'ai_processing' as a subtle background or sidebar header when AI is active.
Use 'connection_success' for the OAuth success page.

rules: Page Transitions: Opacity fade (0 to 1) + slight y-axis slide (10px to 0).
List Items: Staggered entrance (0.05s delay per item).
Contrast: Ensure text is Zinc-900 on White, or Zinc-500 on White (for secondary).
Focus Rings: Visible ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-black on all interactive elements.
ARIA: Use Radix UI primitives (via Shadcn) to ensure full keyboard navigation.

anti_patterns: DO NOT use gradients for buttons.
DO NOT use 'Inter' font if 'Geist' or 'Satoshi' is available (simulate via Google Fonts or local).
DO NOT center text in the email list. Always left-align.
DO NOT use heavy drop shadows.
instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Configure Tailwind colors to match the 'Swiss Utility' palette in `tailwind.config.js`.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that implements the Sidebar + Main Area structure.
4. Use the provided Image URLs for the specific states mentioned.
5. When building the Email List, prioritize DENSITY. Do not make rows too tall (h-12 or h-14 is good).
6. For the 'AI Classification' feature, use a 'Toast' (Sonner) to show progress, not a full-screen modal.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) ONLY for sticky headers.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable in the 'Detail' view, but keep the 'List' view dense.
